name: Common Cold
description: Runny nose, cough, mild fever, sore throat, sneezing, nasal congestion

follow_up_questions.text: Do you have a high fever or difficulty breathing?
How many days have your symptoms been present?

name: Influenza (Flu)
description: High fever, body aches, chills, headache, dry cough, fatigue
selfcare: seek GP for antivirals if early/high risk

follow_up_questions.text: Have your symptoms come on suddenly and are they severe?
Are you in a high-risk group (pregnant, elderly, chronic disease)?

name: COVID-19
description: Fever, dry cough, fatigue, loss of taste or smell, shortness of breath

follow_up_questions.text: Have you noticed a new loss of taste or smell?
Are you struggling to breathe or feeling very breathless?

name: Migraine
description: Severe headache, nausea, vomiting, sensitivity to light or sound, throbbing pain
escalate_when: sudden severe headache, neurological deficit, persistent vomiting

follow_up_questions.text: Is the pain throbbing and one-sided?
Do lights or sounds make the pain worse?

name: Tension Headache
description: Dull head pressure, tight band sensation around head, stress-related headache
escalate_when: sudden severe headache, changes in vision or weakness

follow_up_questions.text: Is the pain a constant dull pressure across both sides of the head?
Is there any neurological change like weakness or slurred speech?

name: Sinusitis
description: Facial pressure, nasal congestion, thick mucus, headache, reduced sense of smell
escalate_when: severe periorbital swelling, persistent high fever, neurological symptoms

follow_up_questions.text: Is the facial pain worse on bending forward or when pressing over the sinuses?
Do you have severe swelling around the eyes or vision changes?

name: Acid Reflux (GERD)
description: Burning chest pain, sour taste, regurgitation, worsening after meals
red_flags: persistent chest pain worrying for cardiac cause
escalate_when: signs of GI bleeding, weight loss, persistent severe symptoms

follow_up_questions.text: Does the burning occur after eating or when lying down?
Do you have vomiting blood or black stools?

name: Gastritis
description: Upper abdominal pain, nausea, bloating, indigestion, fullness after meals

follow_up_questions.text: Are you vomiting blood or noticing black stools?
Is the pain severe and persistent despite self-care?

name: Food Poisoning
description: Vomiting, diarrhea, stomach cramps, fever, nausea after eating contaminated food
escalate_when: unable to keep fluids, bloody stools, high fever

follow_up_questions.text: Do you have bloody diarrhea or are you unable to keep fluids down?
When did the symptoms start after eating?

name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
description: Abdominal cramps, bloating, gas, irregular bowel habits, stress-triggered symptoms
escalate_when: blood in stool, weight loss, persistent severe symptoms

follow_up_questions.text: Do your symptoms improve after passing stool?
Have you noticed blood in stools or unintended weight loss?

name: Appendicitis
description: Severe right lower abdominal pain, nausea, fever, loss of appetite
escalate_when: worsening abdominal pain, fever, vomiting, signs of peritonitis

follow_up_questions.text: Did the pain start centrally and move to the lower right side?
Are you vomiting and unable to tolerate fluids?

name: Pneumonia
description: Cough with phlegm, fever, chest discomfort, difficulty breathing, fatigue
escalate_when: shortness of breath, oxygen saturation low, sepsis signs

follow_up_questions.text: Are you short of breath or breathing much faster than usual?
Is your cough producing green or bloody sputum?

name: Bronchitis
description: Persistent cough, chest tightness, wheezing, mucus production
escalate_when: severe breathlessness, blood in sputum, prolonged symptoms

follow_up_questions.text: Is your breathing much worse or do you have blood in your cough?
How long have you had the cough?

name: Asthma Attack
description: Shortness of breath, wheezing, chest tightness, coughing, triggered by allergens
selfcare: use rescue inhaler per action plan
seek urgent care if not improving

follow_up_questions.text: Has your rescue inhaler helped or not at all?
Are you able to speak in full sentences?

name: Allergic Rhinitis
description: Sneezing, itchy eyes, runny nose, nasal congestion triggered by allergens

follow_up_questions.text: Are you short of breath or is there swelling of the face or throat?
Are symptoms seasonal or related to a trigger?

name: Urinary Tract Infection
description: Burning urination, increased frequency, cloudy urine, lower abdominal pain
selfcare: seek GP for antibiotics if symptoms severe or persistent

follow_up_questions.text: Do you have burning when you pass urine?
Is your urine cloudy or bloody?

name: Kidney Stone
description: Severe flank pain, vomiting, painful urination, blood in urine
selfcare: seek ED if severe or with fever

follow_up_questions.text: Is the pain very severe and coming in waves on one side of your back?
Have you noticed blood in your urine?

name: Dehydration
description: Extreme thirst, dizziness, dry mouth, fatigue, dark urine
selfcare: seek help if unable to drink

follow_up_questions.text: Are you able to keep fluids down and how much urine are you passing?
Are you feeling dizzy on standing or fainting?

name: Anxiety Attack
description: Rapid heartbeat, shortness of breath, trembling, fear, chest tightness

follow_up_questions.text: Are you experiencing chest pain or fainting along with anxiety?
Is this your first episode or have you had similar attacks before?

name: Panic Attack
description: Sudden fear, chest pain, dizziness, tingling, feeling of losing control
red_flags: chest pain suspicious for heart attack
selfcare: seek emergency care if chest pain severe

follow_up_questions.text: Is the chest pain severe or are you fainting?
Do you have ongoing severe symptoms despite calming techniques?

name: Depression
description: Persistent sadness, fatigue, loss of interest, sleep changes, appetite changes
selfcare: safety planning if suicidal ideation present

follow_up_questions.text: Have you had thoughts of harming yourself or not wanting to live?
Are you able to handle day-to-day tasks?

name: Hypertension
description: Headache, blurred vision, chest pressure, dizziness, often asymptomatic
red_flags: very high blood pressure with chest pain or neurological signs
selfcare: seek urgent care if severe symptoms

follow_up_questions.text: Have you had very high BP readings or new chest pain or confusion?
Are you on blood pressure medications and taking them?

name: Diabetes (High Blood Sugar)
description: Excessive urination, thirst, fatigue, blurred vision, slow healing wounds
red_flags: signs of diabetic ketoacidosis (vomiting, confusion, rapid breathing)

follow_up_questions.text: Do you have known diabetes and very high or low glucose readings?
Are you vomiting or confused?

name: Hypoglycemia (Low Blood Sugar)
description: Dizziness, sweating, confusion, hunger, shaking
selfcare: seek urgent care if not improving

follow_up_questions.text: Do you have a glucometer reading for your current sugar level?
Did you take insulin or miss a meal recently?

name: Ear Infection
description: Ear pain, fever, hearing difficulty, fluid drainage, irritability
red_flags: severe ear pain with neurological signs
selfcare: see GP if persistent or severe

follow_up_questions.text: Is there discharge from the ear or severe loss of hearing?
Is the pain very severe or is the patient very unwell?

name: Conjunctivitis (Pink Eye)
description: Red watery eyes, itching, discharge, irritation, contagious infection

follow_up_questions.text: Is your vision affected or do you have severe eye pain?
Is the discharge thick and sticky or watery?

name: Skin Allergy (Dermatitis)
description: Red itchy rash, swelling, irritation, dryness, triggered by allergens

follow_up_questions.text: Did the rash begin after contact with a new product or plant?
Is the rash spreading quickly or showing signs of infection?

name: Cellulitis
description: Red swollen skin, warmth, pain, fever, spreading infection

follow_up_questions.text: Is the redness spreading quickly or is there pus?
Do you have a fever or feel generally unwell?

name: Chickenpox
description: Itchy red blisters, fever, rash spreading across body

follow_up_questions.text: Are you pregnant or an immunocompromised person?
Are blisters spreading with high fever?

name: Dengue Fever
description: High fever, body pain, joint pain, rash, headache behind eyes

follow_up_questions.text: Are you having bleeding from gums, nose, or under the skin?
Do you have severe abdominal pain or vomiting?

name: Malaria
description: High fever, chills, sweating, headache, vomiting
selfcare: seek urgent medical testing and treatment

follow_up_questions.text: Have you recently travelled to a malaria area?
Do you have very high fever or confusion?

name: Typhoid Fever
description: High fever, abdominal pain, headache, weakness, diarrhea or constipation
selfcare: seek medical attention for antibiotics and monitoring

follow_up_questions.text: Have you been exposed to contaminated food/water or travelled recently?
Do you have persistent high fever or severe abdominal pain?

name: Stroke
description: Facial drooping, slurred speech, sudden weakness on one side, confusion

follow_up_questions.text: Did the symptoms start suddenly and include weakness on one side?
Is speech slurred or hard to understand?

name: Heart Attack
description: Chest pain, left arm pain, sweating, shortness of breath, pressure sensation

follow_up_questions.text: Is the chest pain severe, crushing, or radiating to the arm or jaw?
Are you feeling sweaty, faint, or short of breath?

name: Hyperthyroidism
description: Weight loss, tremors, irritability, rapid heartbeat, heat intolerance
red_flags: thyroid storm signs: fever, tachycardia, altered consciousness
selfcare: seek endocrine review for testing and treatment

follow_up_questions.text: Have you noticed rapid weight loss despite increased appetite?
Do you have tremors or heat intolerance?

name: Hypothyroidism
description: Fatigue, weight gain, cold intolerance, dry skin, constipation

follow_up_questions.text: Have you noticed weight gain and increased tiredness?
Are you having cold intolerance or severe constipation?

name: Osteoarthritis
description: Joint pain, stiffness, reduced mobility, worse with activity

follow_up_questions.text: Is pain worse with activity and better with rest?
Is there significant joint swelling or redness?

name: Rheumatoid Arthritis
description: Joint swelling, stiffness, fatigue, pain in multiple joints

follow_up_questions.text: Do you have symmetrical joint swelling and morning stiffness?
Are you experiencing significant fatigue and reduced function?

name: Vertigo
description: Spinning sensation, dizziness, balance issues, nausea

follow_up_questions.text: Is the room spinning and do you feel nauseous or vomiting?
Is there any hearing loss or weakness on one side?

name: Meningitis
description: Severe headache, neck stiffness, fever, light sensitivity

follow_up_questions.text: Do you have a very stiff neck or difficulty touching chin to chest?
Are you unusually sleepy or confused?
